title: Side Projects
description: Simple projects that I built to learn or excerise my skill everyday.

body.raw:
## Chatify
### Description Personal Chat Room or Workspace to share resources and hangout with friends. Live demo • Github
## Pick Movie
### Description Millions of movies and people to discover. Explore now. Live demo • Github
## Music Player
### Description Millions of movies and people to discover. Explore now. Live demo • Github
## Youtube
### Description I used RapidAPI for fetch data from youtube and showing this to front-end Live demo • Github
